sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of McDonald's ( MCD ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.2%.
Year to date, McDonald's has lost about 2.1% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing ( BA ), trading down 1.7%.
Boeing is lower by about 8.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are United Technologies ( UTX ), trading down 1.6%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
